lecture1.title: Syllabus
lecture1.description: An overview what is to be accomplished in this class.

lecture2.title: The Basics
lecture2.description: Mostly review of Intro to ITWS: the process of server communication and internet protocols

lecture3.title: Markup Languages
lecture3.description: This presentation covers the history of markup languages as well as the anatomy of such languages.

lecture4.title: Cascading Style Sheets
lecture4.description: All the information you need to know about coding in CSS.

lecture5.title: APIs
lecture5.description: This presentation tells you what an API is and the ruleset an API must follow.

lecture6.title: Frontend Optimization
lecture6.description: Essentially this is a list of a bunch of things that one can and should optomize while coding.

lab1.title: Group Portfolios
lab1.description: By now, you have established your groups, come up with a team name, and are in the process of writing a proposal for a serious project. It’s a good thing I know you though--it’s going to be really difficult to get clients without a web presence! Doubly ironic for us web developers. Let’s fix that.

lab2.title: Constitution
lab2.description: There’s a law that says all schools with Federal funding need to have some sort of programming about the history of the Constitution on that day (surprise: all universities benefit from Federal funding). But we’re ITWS: we can do better than just one day or just a couple of minutes.

lab3.title: Weather API and More!
lab3.description: We are going to use the OpenWeatherMap API to create a web app to show the weather for Troy, NY.

lab4.title: AI Takes Over ITWS
lab4.description: We are going to make the ITWS website except we will only use AI to generate all the code.

lab5.title: Frontend Optimization
lab5.description: We are going to optimize a game I made called Free Bee as found at https://freebee.fun/play/ It is a clone of the New York Times game Spelling Bee. You can find the source code for the game here: https://github.com/freebee-game/web-client

lab6.title: Spooky LMS
lab6.description: We are going to remake the single spookiest piece of software ever to exist–LMS!
